data

Class JSONUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.JSONUtils

  • public class JSONUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Use this class to get the keys, to write to a file, and getting values. This differs from justing using the JSON classes directly as we keep references to the object centralized. We can take care of any additional code that is needed to read/write to files rather.
